description:
Provides access to Civic Plus - See Click Fix,  allowing you to interact with your data via an LLM. 

Developed and maintained by Sigao.

debug.description: Enable debug mode. If TRUE, the server will use the 'crm-int' subdomain for See Click Fix API requests.

orgId.description: The organization ID for See Click Fix. Note: if debug is TRUE, this should be the ID for your Sandbox instance.

serviceUserName.description: The email address/username of the service account that will make changes in See Click Fix

serviceUserPassword.description: The password of the service account that will make changes in See Click Fix

tools.name: getIssue
tools.description: Get a single issue by its ID from SeeClickFix

issueId.description: The ID of the issue to retrieve

tools.name: getIssues
tools.description: Get a list of issues from SeeClickFix with optional date filtering

endDate.description: End date for filtering issues ISO 8601 format (e.g., "2024-07-28T00:00:00Z")

startDate.description: Start date for filtering issues ISO 8601 format (e.g., "2024-07-28T00:00:00Z")

tools.name: getRequestTypes
tools.description: Step 1 of 3 when creating a new issue. The user must provide a location to get the request types available in that area.

tools.name: getRequestTypeDetails
tools.description: Step 2 of 3 when creating a new issue. Use the information requirements that are returned to prompt the user for that information.

requestTypeId.description: The ID of the request type

tools.name: createIssueWithDetails
tools.description: Step 3 of 3 when creating a new issue. Use the information collected from the user to create the issue.

address.description: Street address where the issue is located

answers.description: Answers to the request type questions (key-value pairs where keys are question IDs)

reporterName.description: Name of the person reporting the issue

reporterEmail.description: Email address of the person reporting the issue

requestTypeId.description: ID of the request type for this issue

tools.name: flagIssue
tools.description: Flag an issue as inappropriate or problematic in SeeClickFix

reason.description: The reason for flagging the issue (e.g., 'inappropriate', 'spam', 'duplicate', 'not_an_issue')

comment.description: Additional comment explaining why the issue is being flagged

issueId.description: The ID of the issue to flag

tools.name: followIssue
tools.description: Follow an issue to receive notifications about updates in SeeClickFix

issueId.description: The ID of the issue to follow

tools.name: updateIssue
tools.description: Update an existing issue in SeeClickFix

issueId.description: The ID of the issue to update

assigneeId.description: ID of the user to assign the issue to

categoryId.description: ID of the category to assign the issue to

tools.name: addComment
tools.description: Add a comment to an issue in SeeClickFix

issueId.description: The ID of the issue to comment on

tools.name: getComments
tools.description: Get all comments for a specific issue in SeeClickFix

issueId.description: The ID of the issue to get comments for

tools.name: closeIssue
tools.description: Close an issue in SeeClickFix with a closing comment

issueId.description: The ID of the issue to close

tools.name: reopenIssue
tools.description: Reopen a closed issue in SeeClickFix with a comment

issueId.description: The ID of the issue to reopen

tools.name: acknowledgeIssue
tools.description: Acknowledge an issue in SeeClickFix with a comment

issueId.description: The ID of the issue to acknowledge

tools.name: changeLocation
tools.description: Change the location of an existing issue in SeeClickFix

lat.description: New latitude coordinate for the issue

lng.description: New longitude coordinate for the issue

address.description: Street address of the new location

issueId.description: The ID of the issue to update location

tools.name: getCurrentTime
tools.description: Get the current date and time
